title: SplitSignal: SEO A/B Testing Made Simple
content:
Skip to content
Resources
Log In
Enterprise SEO A/B Split Testing

SplitSignal makes it easy to run meaningful A/B split tests – without taking up valuable developer or data science resources.

Take the guesswork out of SEO changes

Save time and money with SplitSignal’s simple and effective A/B testing methodology.

Prove the ROI of SEO
Prove the ROI of a single isolated SEO change and unlock more SEO budget.
Client-Side Implementation
Install in seconds with a JavaScript snippet, so you can start testing immediately.
Save Developer Resources
Run SEO split tests on any website platform – without the need for complex code, developers, or extra budget.
SEO Insurance
Validate your SEO changes before allocating your developer resources, to ensure these changes won’t harm your existing traffic.
See how easy it is to use SplitSignal
Simple Tech Setup
Connect Google Search Console with a few clicks and install a small snippet of JavaScript.
Create Test
Formulate your hypotheses, select your Variant and Control pages, and launch your test. It’s that simple.
Analyze Results
SplitSignal uses Google's Causal Impact model to analyze the results – so your data science team doesn’t have to.
Check out the SplitSignal FAQs to learn more.
Make the data-driven decisions you need to scale faster

SplitSignal lets you quickly see which changes cause a direct uplift in search traffic – so you know exactly where to focus to create a positive impact.

Make data-driven decisions

Easily see which changes cause an uplift in search traffic. Use this data to make changes to your site that you know will have a positive impact.

1 / 3
“The SplitSignal tool is really powerful. It made the whole process of testing and changing metadata more efficient. We didn’t need to get the devs involved and had the ability to test each and every idea that came to our mind without having to run for approvals. This opens up so many possibilities we didn’t see before.”
Stephan Cude
Senior Tech SEO Manager at Leafly
Read the success story
“I wanted to be more efficient with my time. I wanted to have more confidence in the results. I wanted to be able to present hard data at our product team meeting and include it in my monthly report for SEO, and none of that stuff was happening when I was doing it manually.”
Jake Jamieson
Senior Manager, SEO at Drizly
Read the success story
“SEO split testing has helped us achieve a 21% lift in organic sessions to our client’s category pages. Without testing, we would have missed this opportunity.”
Rebecca Stewart
Director of Organic Search, Exclusive Concepts Inc.
Read the success story
